files.README.md:
# Media Buying Team Plugins for Claude Code

> Official plugin marketplace for media buying operations, campaign management, and creative development

[![Claude Code](https://img.shields.io/badge/Claude_Code-Plugin_Marketplace-5B4EFF?style=flat-square)](https://code.claude.com)
[![Plugins](https://img.shields.io/badge/Plugins-22-brightgreen?style=flat-square)](/.claude-plugin/marketplace.json)
[![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-blue?style=flat-square)](LICENSE)

**Quick Install:**
```bash
claude plugin marketplace add WalkerHi11/mediabuy-plugins
```

---

## üì¶ What's Included

This marketplace provides **22 professionally configured plugins** for Claude Code, organized into categories for different roles and workflows.

### üí¨ Communication & Productivity (7 plugins)
- **[Slack](/.claude-plugin/plugins/slack)** - Team messaging and notifications
- **[Microsoft Teams](/.claude-plugin/plugins/microsoft-teams)** - Enterprise collaboration
- **[Telegram](/.claude-plugin/plugins/telegram)** - Instant messaging and alerts
- **[Gmail](/.claude-plugin/plugins/gmail)** - Email management
- **[Google Calendar](/.claude-plugin/plugins/google-calendar)** - Schedule coordination
- **[Google Drive](/.claude-plugin/plugins/google-drive)** - File access
- **[Playwright](/.claude-plugin/plugins/playwright)** - Browser automation

### üìã Project Management (2 plugins)
- **[Asana](/.claude-plugin/plugins/asana)** - Task and project tracking
- **[Jira](/.claude-plugin/plugins/jira)** - Issue tracking and Confluence

### üé® Content Generation (2 plugins)
- **[Perplexity](/.claude-plugin/plugins/perplexity)** - AI-powered web research
- **[ElevenLabs](/.claude-plugin/plugins/elevenlabs)** - AI voice generation

### üìà Marketing & E-commerce (10 plugins)
- **[Google Ads](/.claude-plugin/plugins/google-ads)** - Campaign management
- **[Klaviyo](/.claude-plugin/plugins/klaviyo)** - Email marketing automation
- **[Shopify](/.claude-plugin/plugins/shopify)** - E-commerce management
- **[Salesforce](/.claude-plugin/plugins/salesforce)** - CRM and leads
- **[Taboola Launcher](/.claude-plugin/plugins/taboola-launcher)** - Campaign workflow skill ‚≠ê
- **[Ecom Foundation Docs](/.claude-plugin/plugins/ecom-foundation-docs)** - Research ‚Üí angles ‚Üí ads.csv
- **[Ecom AI Image Ads](/.claude-plugin/plugins/ecom-ai-image-ads)** - Daily image plan + prompts + variants
- **[Ecom Copywriter Lab](/.claude-plugin/plugins/ecom-copywriter-lab)** - Branded + hard sell + long-form tests
- **[Ecom Meta Testing OS](/.claude-plugin/plugins/ecom-meta-testing-os)** - Naming/UTM + guardrails + ops
- **[Ecom Learning Loop](/.claude-plugin/plugins/ecom-learning-loop)** - Registry + winner‚Üívariants loop

---

## üöÄ Quick Start

### Prerequisites

- [Claude Code](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/setup) v1.0.33 or later
- Git (for marketplace updates)

### Installation

#### Option 1: One-Line Install (Recommended)

```bash
curl -sL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/WalkerHi11/mediabuy-plugins/main/install-marketplace.sh | bash
```

This will:
1. ‚úÖ Add the marketplace to Claude Code
2. üìã Show available plugins
3. üí° Provide next steps

#### Option 2: Manual Install

```bash
# Add the marketplace
claude plugin marketplace add WalkerHi11/mediabuy-plugins

# Browse available plugins
claude
/plugin
# Tab to "Discover" to see all plugins

# Install plugins you need
/plugin install perplexity@mediabuy-team
/plugin install playwright@mediabuy-team
/plugin install telegram@mediabuy-team
```

---

## üë• Recommended Setups by Role

### üéØ Media Buyer / Campaign Manager

```bash
claude plugin install perplexity@mediabuy-team
claude plugin install playwright@mediabuy-team
claude plugin install telegram@mediabuy-team
```

**Setup credentials:**
```bash
export PERPLEXITY_API_KEY="pplx-..."
export TG_APP_ID="12345678"
export TG_API_HASH="abc..."
```

### ‚úçÔ∏è Creative Director / Copywriter

```bash
claude plugin install perplexity@mediabuy-team
claude plugin install playwright@mediabuy-team
claude plugin install elevenlabs@mediabuy-team
```

**Setup credentials:**
```bash
export PERPLEXITY_API_KEY="pplx-..."
export ELEVENLABS_API_KEY="sk_..."
```

### üìä Analyst / Performance Manager

```bash
claude plugin install google-ads@mediabuy-team
claude plugin install perplexity@mediabuy-team
claude plugin install telegram@mediabuy-team
```

**Setup credentials:**
```bash
export GOOGLE_ADS_DEVELOPER_TOKEN="..."
export GOOGLE_ADS_CLIENT_ID="..."
export GOOGLE_ADS_CLIENT_SECRET="..."
export GOOGLE_ADS_REFRESH_TOKEN="..."
```

### üõçÔ∏è E-commerce Manager

```bash
claude plugin install shopify@mediabuy-team
claude plugin install klaviyo@mediabuy-team
claude plugin install google-ads@mediabuy-team
```

**Setup credentials:**
```bash
export SHOPIFY_STORE_URL="your-store.myshopify.com"
export SHOPIFY_ACCESS_TOKEN="shpat_..."
export KLAVIYO_API_KEY="pk_..."
```

[See more role-based setups ‚Üí](PLUGIN-QUICK-START.md)

---

## üìñ Plugin Difficulty Matrix

| Plugin | Difficulty | Time | Credentials Required |
|--------|-----------|------|---------------------|
| Playwright | üü¢ Easy | 2 min | None |
| Perplexity | üü¢ Easy | 5 min | API Key |
| ElevenLabs | üü¢ Easy | 5 min | API Key |
| Klaviyo | üü¢ Easy | 5 min | API Key |
| Taboola Launcher | üü¢ Easy | 1 min | None (Skill only) |
| Telegram | üü° Medium | 10 min | API ID + Hash |
| Asana | üü° Medium | 10 min | Access Token |
| Gmail | üü° Medium | 15 min | Google OAuth |
| Google Calendar | üü° Medium | 15 min | Google OAuth |
| Google Drive | üü° Medium | 15 min | Google OAuth |
| Slack | üü° Medium | 15 min | Bot Token |
| Shopify | üü° Medium | 15 min | Store URL + Token |
| Jira | üü° Medium | 20 min | Atlassian OAuth |
| Salesforce | üî¥ Hard | 25 min | CLI Auth |
| Microsoft Teams | üî¥ Hard | 25 min | Azure AD |
| Google Ads | üî¥ Hard | 30 min | Dev Token + OAuth |

---

## üí° Usage Examples

### Research with Perplexity
```
"Research what competitors are doing in mortgage lead gen"
"What are the latest trends in native advertising?"
"Find examples of high-performing VSL hooks"
```

### Automation with Playwright
```
"Screenshot the top 3 competitor landing pages"
"Extract all headlines from Facebook Ad Library"
"Test the mobile version of our page"
```

### Campaign Management with Google Ads
```
"How are our Google Ads campaigns performing this week?"
"Pause campaigns that have spent over budget"
"What keywords are driving the most conversions?"
```

### Team Alerts with Telegram
```
"Send a Telegram message when spend hits $500"
"Alert the team about this winning creative"
"Check messages in the Buyers group"
```

### Campaign Workflow with Taboola Launcher (Skill)
```
/taboola-launcher vertical:mortgage brief:"Florida homeowners paying 7%+" everflow-offer-ids:"654"
```
‚Üí Orchestrates complete campaign creation using your existing MCP servers

[See more examples ‚Üí](MARKETPLACE-COMPLETE.md#usage-examples)

---

## üõ†Ô∏è For Team Administrators

### Auto-Install for Projects

Add to your project's `.claude/settings.json`:

```json
{
  "plugin": {
    "extraKnownMarketplaces": [
      {
        "source": "WalkerHi11/mediabuy-plugins",
        "autoUpdate": true
      }
    ],
    "enabledPlugins": {
      "perplexity@mediabuy-team": "project",
      "playwright@mediabuy-team": "project",
      "telegram@mediabuy-team": "project"
    }
  }
}
```

When team members trust the repository folder, Claude Code will prompt them to install these plugins automatically.

[See full admin guide ‚Üí](MARKETPLACE-COMPLETE.md#configure-team-marketplaces)

---

## üìö Documentation

- **[Complete Setup Guide](MARKETPLACE-COMPLETE.md)** - Detailed installation, hosting, and troubleshooting
- **[Quick Start Guide](PLUGIN-QUICK-START.md)** - Role-based plugin recommendations
- **[Hosting Guide](MARKETPLACE-HOSTING.md)** - Deploy to GitHub/GitLab/Render

### Plugin Documentation

Each plugin has detailed setup instructions in its `plugin.json`:

```bash
# View plugin details
cat .claude-plugin/plugins/PLUGIN-NAME/plugin.json
```

Or browse in Claude Code: `/plugin` ‚Üí Discover ‚Üí Select plugin

---

## üîÑ Updating

### Auto-Updates (Recommended)

Enable automatic marketplace updates at startup:

```json
{
  "extraKnownMarketplaces": [
    {
      "source": "WalkerHi11/mediabuy-plugins",
      "autoUpdate": true
    }
  ]
}
```

### Manual Updates

```bash
claude plugin marketplace update mediabuy-team
```

---

## ü§ù Contributing

Want to add a new plugin? Follow these steps:

1. **Create plugin directory:**
   ```bash
   mkdir -p .claude-plugin/plugins/your-plugin
   ```

2. **Add `plugin.json`** with proper schema (see examples in existing plugins)

3. **Update `marketplace.json`** to reference your plugin

4. **Test locally:**
   ```bash
   claude plugin marketplace add /path/to/mediabuy
   claude plugin install your-plugin@mediabuy-team
   ```

5. **Submit a PR** with your changes

[See plugin format reference ‚Üí](MARKETPLACE-COMPLETE.md#plugin-format-reference)

---

## üêõ Troubleshooting

### Marketplace not showing in `/plugin`

```bash
# Check if it's added
claude plugin marketplace list

# Add it manually
claude plugin marketplace add WalkerHi11/mediabuy-plugins
```

### Plugin installation fails

1. Verify the plugin exists: `ls .claude-plugin/plugins/PLUGIN-NAME/`
2. Check `plugin.json` is valid JSON
3. View errors: `/plugin` ‚Üí Errors tab

### MCP server not starting

1. Verify credentials are set: `echo $PERPLEXITY_API_KEY`
2. Test command manually: `npx -y @perplexity-ai/mcp-server`
3. Check logs in `/plugin` ‚Üí Errors tab

[See full troubleshooting guide ‚Üí](MARKETPLACE-COMPLETE.md#troubleshooting)

---

## üìû Support

- **Documentation**: See the `/docs` folder or links above
- **Issues**: [Open an issue](../../issues)
- **Questions**: [Start a discussion](../../discussions)

---

## üìÑ License

MIT License - See [LICENSE](LICENSE) for details

---

## üåü Star This Repo

If this marketplace is helpful, give it a star! ‚≠ê

---

**Maintained by**: Media Buying Team
**Last Updated**: 2026-01-27
**Claude Code Version**: 1.0.33+

---

## üîó Related Resources

- [Official Claude Code Documentation](https://code.claude.com/docs)
- [Plugin Development Guide](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/plugins)
- [MCP Server Documentation](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/mcp)
- [Marketplace Creation Guide](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/plugin-marketplaces)

plugins.name: asana
plugins.description: Connect to Asana for task management, project tracking, and team coordination. Create tasks, manage projects, and track work progress directly from Claude.

plugins.name: elevenlabs
plugins.description: AI voice generation and text-to-speech with ElevenLabs. Create realistic voiceovers, convert text to audio, and clone voices.

plugins.name: gmail
plugins.description: Read and send emails through Gmail. Search your inbox, draft emails, and manage your email communications.

plugins.name: google-ads
plugins.description: Manage Google Ads campaigns, keywords, and performance data. Create campaigns, adjust bids, and analyze advertising performance.

plugins.name: google-calendar
plugins.description: Manage your Google Calendar events. View schedules, create events, and check availability across calendars.

plugins.name: google-drive
plugins.description: Access and manage files in Google Drive. Search, read, and organize documents, spreadsheets, and other files.

plugins.name: jira
plugins.description: Connect to Jira and Confluence for issue tracking, sprint management, and documentation. Manage tickets, search issues, and access Confluence pages.

plugins.name: klaviyo
plugins.description: Email marketing automation with Klaviyo. Manage campaigns, segments, and subscriber lists. Track email performance and automate workflows.

plugins.name: microsoft-teams
plugins.description: Connect to Microsoft Teams for messaging, channels, and team collaboration. Read messages, post updates, and manage team communications.

plugins.name: perplexity
plugins.description: AI-powered web search and research with Perplexity. Get real-time information with citations, conduct research, and answer questions with up-to-date sources.

plugins.name: playwright
plugins.description: Browser automation and web scraping with Playwright. Navigate websites, fill forms, take screenshots, and extract data from web pages.

plugins.name: salesforce
plugins.description: Connect to Salesforce CRM for lead management, opportunity tracking, and customer data. Query records, create leads, and manage sales pipeline.

plugins.name: shopify
plugins.description: Connect to Shopify for store management, product catalog, and order processing. Manage products, check orders, and access store analytics.

plugins.name: slack
plugins.description: Read messages, search conversations, and post to Slack channels. Monitor team communications and automate notifications.

plugins.name: taboola-launcher
plugins.description: Launch complete Taboola native ad campaigns with AI-generated creative assets. Orchestrates campaign creation, landing page generation, tracking setup, and image generation using existing MCP servers.

plugins.name: telegram
plugins.description: Connect to Telegram for messaging, channels, and group management. Read messages, send notifications, and manage conversations.

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Guide for creating effective skills that extend Claude's capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, or tool integrations. Use when building new skills or improving existing ones.

plugins.name: ecom-foundation-docs
plugins.description: Ecom strategy automation: Research ‚Üí Avatar ‚Üí Offer Brief ‚Üí Necessary Beliefs ‚Üí Angle Matrix ‚Üí ads.csv. Produces structured inputs for creative/copy/testing.

plugins.name: ecom-ai-image-ads
plugins.description: Daily ecom image-ad system: foundation docs + competitor examples ‚Üí creative plan + prompts + winner‚Üívariants loop.

plugins.name: ecom-copywriter-lab
plugins.description: Ecom ad copy packs: branded/trust + hard sell + chapter-length primary text tests; outputs Meta-friendly text-variation sets per angle.

plugins.name: ecom-meta-testing-os
plugins.description: Ecom Meta testing operating system: naming + UTMs + creative matrix presets + pause/scale guardrails + daily reporting.

plugins.name: ecom-learning-loop
plugins.description: Creative learning loop: store prompts + angles + performance tags; then generate ‚Äú20 new variants of the best angle‚Äù on command.
